action.description: The type of action requested by the client or delivered by the server

requestId.description: Returned by the server in the response and used by the client to  link the request and response messages.

path.description: The path to the desired vehicle signal(s), as defined by the Vehicle Signal Specification (VSS).

value.description: The path to the desired vehicle signal(s), as defined by the Vehicle Signal Specification (VSS).

timestamp.description: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time that the server returned the response (expressed as number of lliseconds).

filters.description: May be specified in order to throttle the demands of subscriptions on the server.

interval.description: The subscription will provide notifications with a period equal to this field's value.

range.description: The subscription will provide notifications only when within a given range.

below.description: The subscription will provide notifications when the value is less or equal to this field's value.

above.description: The subscription will provide notifications when the value is greater than or equal to this field's value.

minChange.description: The subscription will provide notifications when a value has changed by the amount specified in this field.

subscriptionId.description: Integer handle value which is used to uniquely identify the subscription.

vss.description: Metadata describing the potentially available VSS tree.

reason.description: Pre-defined string value that can be used to distinguish between errors that have the same code

message.description: Message text describing the cause in more detail
